title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 8
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 8
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" NewLink Genetics (NLNK). NewLink Genetics Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest one-day loss since the drug developer went public in 2011. The stock tumbled after Switzerland's Roche Holding AG moved to end a 2 1/2-year partnership with the company on an experimental cancer drug. Roche's Genentech unit returned the rights for the treatment to NewLink, which had been eligible for more than $1 billion in payments under the deal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
